remarks: A function with period T is also periodic with period nonnegative multiple of T. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
fperiodmullem.f $e |- ( ph -> F : RR --> CC ) $.
fperiodmullem.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. RR ) $.
fperiodmullem.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
fperiodmullem.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. RR ) $.
fperiodmullem.per $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. RR ) -> ( F ` ( x + T ) ) = ( F ` x ) ) $.
fperiodmullem $p |- ( ph -> ( F ` ( X + ( N x. T ) ) ) = ( F ` X ) ) $.
$d F x $.
$d T x $.
$d X x $.
$d ph x $.
